about.title: CREATING A NEW WORLD OF FLAVORS
about.subtitle: ABOUT U BLANICKÝCH RYTÍŘŮ
description: Welcome to U Blanických rytířů, where traditional Czech cuisine meets the elegant atmosphere of a historic castle. Located in the beautiful Vlašim Castle surrounded by an English park, we bring authentic Czech flavors to every plate.

Our professional team of chefs meticulously crafts each dish using the finest local ingredients and traditional recipes. From hearty goulash to the classic svíčková, every bite reflects our commitment to preserving Czech culinary heritage while embracing modern presentation.
about.pageSubtitle: Castle restaurant with long tradition, completely renovated. Located in Vlašim Castle near the legendary Blaník Mountain.

cta.title: READY TO EXPERIENCE
cta.description: Reserve your table today and embark on a culinary journey through the heart of Czech gastronomy in our historic castle setting

testimonials.text: Amazing experience! The svíčková was perfect, dumplings were fluffy and the sauce creamy. The castle setting adds a special atmosphere to the meal. Service was very attentive and professional.
testimonials.author: Peter Novák

testimonials.text: We visited the restaurant during the weekend and were delighted. The goulash was excellent, meat tender and taste authentic. Beautiful setting and lovely service. We'll definitely return!
testimonials.author: Marie Svobodová

testimonials.text: Great Czech cuisine in a beautiful castle setting. The roasted duck was fantastic, red cabbage perfectly seasoned. Wine from their own vineyards is excellent. Highly recommend to everyone!
testimonials.author: Jan Dvořák

testimonials.text: The restaurant exceeded all expectations. Schnitzel was crispy, potato salad had that homemade taste. The atmosphere is elegant yet cozy. Staff very friendly and efficient.
testimonials.author: Anna Procházková
